type.name: DIAL_NUMBER
type.title: Dial Number
type.description: You call the number you specified for the dial app. Dial app that would have been displayed at the end is a fault. Method call is equivalent to manual input, execution has been limited in many models.
type.defaultdescription: This will call the %dialnumber% for a dial app.

type.name: BROADCAST_SECRET_CODE
type.title: Broadcast Secret Code
type.description: Will broadcast a secret code. And broadcast, refers to the simultaneous notification to the program that can be received by this terminal. Is how to call a general of the secret code, execution has been limited in many models.
type.defaultdescription: Calls in %secretcode% broadcast a secret code.

type.name: DIRECTLY_CALL_ACTIVITY
type.title: Directly Call Activity
type.description: This will directly call the activity class of the app. Method is a special call from the program. In some cases, you can also call "screen that can not be called manually." (If it exists function)
type.defaultdescription: This will directly call the %class% class.

type.name: USSD_EXPLOIT_CALL
type.title: USSD Exploit Call
type.description: Call the number, Using USSD Exploit. Hope an experimental feature, and it does not work on many models.
type.defaultdescription: This will call the %dialnumber% for a dial app.
